item.title: Traders hope the Ukraine war ends soon. Experts say there's no 'quick fix'
item.description: Global markets were on tenterhooks Monday as momentum to end the war in Ukraine ramped up. Experts warn there is no "quick fix," and talks could last ...

item.title: Trump puts onus on Zelenskyy to end conflict with Russia ahead of meeting
item.description: In a post on Truth Social, Trump said that Zelenskyy could "end the war with Russia almost immediately, if he wants to, or he can continue to fight."

item.title: White House envoy claims Russia agreed to 'Article 5-like' security guarantees for Ukraine
item.description: Special Envoy Steve Witkoff's remarks come just days after President Donald Trump met in Alaska with the Russian president to discuss ending the war i...

item.title: Zelenskyy to meet with Trump after Putin talks end without a ceasefire
item.description: Zelenskyy said he and Trump would meet Monday to "discuss all of the details regarding ending the killing and the war."

item.title: FBI Director Patel and foundation win defamation lawsuit against blogger, awarded $250,000
